page.title: 15Tourism Survey
page.content:
We asked 10 different questions. 1. Do you live in Felixstowe? We found from our survey that there were 62 who donÂ£t live in Felixstowe and 5 who did. We did not include these 5 people in our survey.
2.Have you been here before? We found from our survey that 42 people have been here before, and 5 have not visited Felixstowe before. It seems that most visitors return to Felixstowe
3.We asked people, "Where are you staying?" and 13 of them said,"I am down here on a day trip," 14 of them said,"I am staying at a camp site" 1 of them said,"I am staying with friends." 1 said,"I am staying on a ship," 1 said, "I am staying in a lorry," and 1 said, "I am staying in an hotel".
